summary: Although DOD reported over $4.1 trillion in assets in its financial statements in FY2024—a significant portion of the government’s total assets—it remains the only major federal agency that has never gotten a "clean" audit opinion (i.e., when auditors find that financial statements are presented fairly). title: DOD Financial Management: Insights into the Auditability of DOD’s Fiscal Year 2024 Balance Sheet
